string.name: newbie_info_2
string.text: If you fail to send in orders for one of the first two turns, your faction will be erased from the game to reduce the number of zombie players in Eressea.

string.name: newbie_info_3
string.text: With the first two turns, you will get a computer report (CR). It can be used with many of the tools on http://eressea-pbem.de/download.html. If you want to continue getting it after the second turn, please make one of your units give the order OPTION COMPUTER.
